name: AUTUM "the Katze" BMX frame (19,9")
description:
THE KATZE 19.9“ frame is a true BMX Freestyle frame! Designed for riders who do not want to limit their riding to just one category of BMX. Grind a nice rail, nose that perfect ledge, go for a little skatepark session, manual down the street, hit the local mini trails or practise your newest flatland combo. This frame is designed for riders of that kind of mind. You will have lot of fun with the little KATZE!

Proven geometry and aggressively tested.

Specs:

19.9“ Toptube, 13“ (slammed!) Chainstays, 74.5° Headtube angle, 73° Seattube angle, standover (center BB – center TT) 200mm (a little bit lower as Katze 20.9" frame), integrated chain tensioners, 14mm new removeable brake hardware, Mid BB, BB height 40mm (from centerline), integrated campa style headbearing.

Weight is only 2150g .

Available colours: matte black, translucent gold & british racing green


<iframe src="http://player.vimeo.com/video/63158929?title=0&byline=0&portrait=0&color=ffffff" width="250" height="141" frameborder="0" webkitAllowFullScreen mozallowfullscreen allowFullScreen></iframe>

name: AUTUM "the Razzia V2" BMX frame
description:
100 % Japanese Sanko 4130CrMo BMX Frame

Flat? Street? Whatever! design

THE RAZZIA frame is designed for aggressive BMX Flatland riding. It fits to Flatland riders who want a simple and little bit larger frame or smaller street riders. It can take heavy abuse! THE RAZZIA is perfect for street inspired Flatland riding.

Long time tested and currently ridden by one of the most radical flatlanders out there: Waldemar Fatkin!

Specs:

19.3“ Toptube, 12.4“ (slammed!) Chainstays, 74.5° Headtube angle, 73° Seattube angle, standover (center BB – center TT) 175mm, integrated chain tensioners, 10mm dropouts new removeable brake hardware, spanish BB, BB heigth (from centerline) 45mm, integrated campagnolo style headbearing.

Weight is only 1870g.

Available colours: matte black & dark red

<iframe src="http://player.vimeo.com/video/60782764?title=0&byline=0&portrait=0&color=ffffff" width="250" height="141" frameborder="0" webkitAllowFullScreen mozallowfullscreen allowFullScreen></iframe>

<iframe src="http://player.vimeo.com/video/66510992?title=0&byline=0&portrait=0&color=ffffff" width="250" height="141" frameborder="0" webkitAllowFullScreen mozallowfullscreen allowFullScreen></iframe>

name: AUTUM - "the Lash" BMX Flatland frame
description:
THE LASH is the successor for the legendary AUTUM Blitz frame. It is designed for the best & most progressive flatland riding!

Fully heattreated for improved stiffness and to make this frame so light.

Long time tested, contest approved and influenced by Keji „Tamao“ Nakamura, Dominik Nekolny and Matti Röse.

Specs: 18.7“ Toptube, 12.8“ (slammed!) chainstays, 74.5° headtube angle, 73° seattube angle, standover (center BB – center TT) 150mm, integrated chain tensioners, 10mm dropouts, new removeable brake hardware, spanish BB, BB height 45mm (from centerline) , integrated campagnolo style headbearing.

Weight 1750g.

Available colours: matte black, matte navy & shiny silver

<iframe src="http://player.vimeo.com/video/69616251?byline=0&portrait=0&color=ffffff" width="250" height="141" frameborder="0" webkitAllowFullScreen mozallowfullscreen allowFullScreen></iframe>

description:
This is the new NARCOBAR. It is an allround handlebar for all types of riding.
Featuring a slightly increased height. It will feel good and look great on your bike!
The Narcobar is light & super strong. Maybe this will be the last handlebar for you to buy!

Now coming also in chrome and featuring the new AUTUM laser branding. 

Specs: height 8.7“, width 28,3“ (720mm), multi butted, backsweep 10°, upsweep 2°. Comes packed in AUTUM paper box.

Weight: only 830g

Available colours: glossy black & chrome

description:

Increased size and proportions. You will see and feel the difference. It will look and feel great on your bike!

Successfully tested & currently ridden by Dominik Nekolny and Matti Röse.

Now coming also in chrome and featuring the new AUTUM laser branding.

Succesfully, agressively tested on the rough streets of Berlin, London and Vienna!

20.9“ Toptube, 13“ (slammed!) Chainstays, 74.5° Headtube angle, 73° Seattube angle, standover (center BB – center TT) 200mm

Integrated chain tensioners, new removeable brake hardware, Mid BB, BB height 40mm (from centerline), integrated campa style headbearing.

name: Rubena DOM X Flatland tire
description:
Dominik Nekolny about his signature tire:

Tire is one of the most important components of your bike. Since my early beginnings, I have always wanted to make tire exactly according to my wishes and requirements. This dream come true 10 years later in early 2012, when Rubena a.s. contacted me with offer of cooperation on producing my signature tire. When I was designing my tire, there were several parameters which were important for me. The most important parameter was of course the adhesion of tire, which we managed to do absolutely great and is exactly on the border of excellent adhesion, yet good lifetime. The tire is ridden down evenly. Equally important parameter was design – I wanted the tire did not carry my name only, but also something that describes me – I think we succeeded pretty well here. Tires will be produced in two versions: version “Elite” with foldable Kevlar construction and the overall weight of stunning 280g. A further version is “Economy” with non-foldable construction and overall weight 460g and lower price. All tires are made in Czech Republic. In the end there is a tire with very nice design, with the best adhesion a very good price - all you need from the TOP tire!

Versions:
xDOMx Elite level
Color: black
Size: 20“
Width: 1.6 (44mm)
TPI: 127
Construction: Racing Pro
Weight: 280g

name: MOTO BICYCLES - Urban Pedals
description:
Ultra Slim Platform Pedal!

The pedals are one of three contact points between you and your bike. The more efficiently this contact point can function, the better your muscle power can be harnessed to propel your bike. With the new MOTO pedal, you will experience a new dimension of cycling.
Be it in sneakers or high heels, leather soles or barefoot, come rain or shine – you can always expect maximum comfort and safety from your pedals. 

Moto has come up with a radically new design for the pedal, which breaks with convention. No pins, no plastic, no metal!

A completely new great feeling riding bikes!

THIS PEDAL IS A HIGH PERFORMANCE PART! AT THIS TIME WE DO NOT RECOMMEND IT FOR HEAVY BMX/MTB USE BUT AS A GREAT UPGRADE FOR ALL YOUR OTHER BICYCLES!

For this use it's maybe the best pedal out there!

Designed in Berlin!

The MOTO Pedal is manufactured entirely in Germany, using only the highest quality materials.

FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE!

www.motobicycles.com

<iframe width="300" height="169" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/6EDT3rbPJr4?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: D.O.M. Pegs
description:
Brand new D.O.M. pegs - still hot from manufacture! 

The newest and lightest pegs with special surface modification. Griptape was replaced be special knurling, which features very good grip and long life of knurling. 

Super light aluminium body with durable steel endcap. 
These pegs will last a long time!

There are four positions for fixing pegs in your fork and frame. 

Designed and long time tested by Dominik Nekolny!
Made in the Czech Republic.

Diameter:   35 mm
Length:      115 mm
Weight:      220 g (pair)
Axle hole:  10 mm

Shipping:

Germany:             Free shipping
Everywhere else:  7,50EUR

name: KIS Bike Co. - 17mm "TWIST" - Pivotal socket seatpost
description:
Great Idea!

This is what KIS says about this seatpost:     

So, we want you to only need one tool in your pocket. The, unsung hero, the 6mm Allen key! With riders who use pegs, this became a bit of a problem. We worked on slotted bayonet fixtures and all manner of crazy peg designs and ideas for months until we realised, we really cannot change the function and powerful design of a peg. They take too much abuse to start making them in two parts. So... We did a bit of reverse thinking and developed this idea. The Integrated 17mm Socket set and seat post! Basically, you use your 6mm Allen key to take your seat and post out. Your seat and post then become your socket set for your pegs. So simple, so functional, and ideal for road-trips,at home or abroad.

The posts are long enough (135mm) for most pegs.

Diameter: 25,4mm
Weight: 109g
